explains: vt. 清理；整顿；解开……纠结

sentences.en: He was found desperately trying to untangle several reels of film.
sentences.cn: 人们发现他正拼命地试图解开纠结的几圈胶片。

sentences.en: He's forced to untangle a complex web of financial dealings.
sentences.cn: 他被迫去理顺一大堆错综复杂的金融交易。

sentences.en: Lawyers and accountants began trying to untangle the complex affairs of the bank.
sentences.cn: 律师和会计们开始尝试理清银行复杂的事务。
